A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star War: The Last Jedi is an excellent film. It is about Rey who develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker. Daisy Ridley\, Mark Hamill\, and Carrie Fisher give incredible performances. The script is well written. Rian Johnson did a great job directing this movie. I enjoyed watching this motion picture because of the action and fantasy. Star Wars: The Last Jedi is a must see.
